General.Name: Aurora Technology Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Aurora Technology Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on businesses in the technology companies, including artificial intelligence, blockchain, quantum computing, and electric vehicles in Asia and North America. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 4 Embarcadero Center, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94105
